content: ## Configure the Edit Fields node Now search for the **Edit Fields (Set) node** after you've selected the **+** sign coming off the If node's `true` connector. With the Edit Fields node window open, configure these parameters: - Ensure **Mode** is set to **Manual Mapping**. - While you can use the **Expression editor** we used in the [Filtering Orders](/courses/level-one/chapter-5/chapter-5.3.md) lesson, this time, let's drag the fields from the **Input** into the **Fields to Set**: - Drag **If** > **orderID** as the first field. - Drag **If** > **employeeName** as the second field. - Ensure that **Include Other Input Fields** is set to false. Select **Execute step**. You should see the following results:
